name: Alexis Lu
bio: C++ is a powerful language, and I love it for its speed and abundance of utilities. It works both at high-level and low-level, simple and complex program.

name: Marcell Lipp
link_text: How to survive as a programmer?
bio: I'm working with cpp with years and I'm really fighting to achieve a better code quality all around the world, so I'm happy to help
